Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/compiler_rt/dist/lib/builtins/addvsi3.c

1/* ===-- addvsi3.c - Implement __addvsi3 -----------------------------------===
2 *
3 * The LLVM Compiler Infrastructure
4 *
5 * This file is dual licensed under the MIT and the University of Illinois Open
6 * Source Licenses. See LICENSE.TXT for details.
7 *
8 * ===----------------------------------------------------------------------===
9 *
10 * This file implements __addvsi3 for the compiler_rt library.
11 *
12 * ===----------------------------------------------------------------------===
13 */
14
15#include "int_lib.h"
16
17/* Returns: a + b */
18
19/* Effects: aborts if a + b overflows */
20
21COMPILER_RT_ABI si_int
22__addvsi3(si_int a, si_int b)
23{
24 si_int s = (su_int) a + (su_int) b;
25 if (b >= 0)
26 {
27 if (s < a)
28 compilerrt_abort();
29 }
30 else
31 {
32 if (s >= a)
33 compilerrt_abort();
34 }
35 return s;
36}
37
